title: ISic001748. I.Sicily inscription 001748
body:
Facsimile Images

Ἱέραξ ἐν-
θά( vac. 1)δε
κῖ((christogram))τε

Apparatus criticus

Text of Orsi 1893

English translation

Hierax lies here

commentary
